description: Single storey rear extension (following part removal of rear addition); Installation of AC unit to ground floor side elevation; and alteration to side elevation, involving installation of window (following removal of two existing windows)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and document title number(s): Site Location Plan; 100_00 Rev X (Proposed Location Plan); 100_01 Rev X (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 100_02 Rev X (Proposed First Floor Plan); 100_04 Rev X (Existing Ground & First Floor Plan); 100_05 Rev X (Existing Front & Rear Elevations); 100_06 Rev X (Existing Right & Left Elevations); 100_07 Rev X (Proposed Rear Elevation); 100_08 Rev X (Proposed Left Elevation); 100_09 Rev X (Proposed Right Elevation); 100_10 Rev X (Existing & Proposed Roof Plan); 100_20 Rev X (Proposed Front Elevation); Outdoor Unit RXA42B Referred in Air Conditioning Product Information Daikin FTXA-A/B (W/S/T/B) / RXA-A/B - All Received on 15 and 22 September 2022

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B  of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 & D4  of

the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3and D4 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted

Development (Core) Strategy 2012. | Prior to use the AC unit hereby approved shall be mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors shall be vibration isolated from the casing and adequately silenced and maintained as such.

Reason:  To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by vibration noise from mechanical installations/ equipment, in accordance with Policies D13 and D14 of the London Plan (2021) and Policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
